meanings: 질문과 대답 A long time ago.

vlive.korean: 꽤 오래 전 일이라 기억이 안 나네요 - 그래요? It was such a long time ago that I don't remember. - Oh really? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [엑시 설아] 엑떨의 우쥬크박스🎧 Ep.10
vlive.english: It was such a long time ago that I don't remember. - Oh really?

vlive.korean: 제가 정말 오래 전에... A long time ago... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 현진이의 고민상담소 첫번째❣️
너무 오래전이어서 가사를 조금... I forgot the lyrics because it was so long ago. 듣기 View video NCT : 드디어퇴근길vapp한다!!
vlive.english: I forgot the lyrics because it was so long ago.

vlive.korean: 아무튼 되게 오래전에 그냥.. 뭐라 해야 되지? Anyway, it's been a long time... How should I explain this? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just One 10 Minutes
vlive.english: Anyway, it's been a long time... How should I explain this?

vlive.korean: 너무 오래 전이라... That was so long ago... 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]밥 잘 사주는 예쁜 누나 X 앞터V (Something in the Rain X Early Interview)

examples.korean: If it had been left to me I would have put him out on the street long ago. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것을 내게 맡겨 놓았더라면 난 그 녀석을 오래 전에 길거리에 나앉게 했을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If it had been left to me I would have put him out on the street long ago. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: an old war wound 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오래 전 전장에서 입은 상처 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an old war wound Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The house was pulled down long ago. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 집은 오래 전에 헐렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house was pulled down long ago. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He stopped working some time ago. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 꽤 오래 전에 일을 그만뒀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He stopped working some time ago. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I first met him way back in the 80s. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그를 오래 전인 80년대에 처음 만났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I first met him way back in the 80s. Add to Wordbook
